H0.text: In the song “Food, Glorious Food”, which food is mentioned first. Roast Beef

H1.text: In the song “Food, Glorious Food”, which food is mentioned first. Peas

H2.text: In the song “Food, Glorious Food”, which food is mentioned first. Sausages

H3.text: In the song “Food, Glorious Food”, which food is mentioned first. Cold Jelly and Custard

A4.text: The children arrive for breakfast fantasizing about delicious food such as sausage and mustard.
